entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. A few showers beginning overnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few showers ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. A few showers beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
